Package controller.factories

Class Summary
Address This is an abstract class for displayed forms of addresses.
AddresseeFrance This class creates a displayed form of a french addressee address.
AddresseeGermany This class creates a displayed form of a german addressee address.
AddresseeGreatBritain This class creates a displayed form of a british addressee address.
AddresserFrance This class creates a displayed form of a french addresser address.
AddresserGermany This class creates a displayed form of a german addresser address.
AddresserGreatBritain This class creates a displayed form of a british addresser address.
BundleBuilder This class creates a new instance of class Locale accordingly to a country.
Date Class which creates a String which contains a date for a letter.
DateFrench Class which creates a String which contains a date in french form.
DateGerman Class which creates a String which contains a date in german form.
DocumentBuilder This class provides displayable forms of texts, dates and addresses to other classes.
FactoryAddressee This class defines which address object will be used for the displayed form of the addressee.
FactoryAddresser This class defines which address object will be used for the displayed form of the addresser.
FactoryDate This class defines which date object will be used for the displayed form of the date.
FactoryText This class defines which text object will be used for the displayed form of the text.
LocaleBuilderTargetLanguage This class creates a new instance of class Locale accordingly to the selected target language.
Text This is an abstract class for displayed forms of text.
TextAdvertisement This class creates a displayed form of an advertisement text.
TextEMail This class creates a displayed form of an e-mail text.
TextLetter This class creates a displayed form of an letter text.
